cu.explanation_en: Setting gNB_ID to '0xe00x' (invalid hexadecimal with extra 'x') will cause parsing failure and gNB identification error.

du.explanation_en: Setting remote_n_address to null will cause missing CU IP address and front-haul connection failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 remote_n_address 設定為 null 會導致 CU IP 地址缺失並造成前傳連接失敗。
